oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Corner of Church Street and 4th Avenue North, c.1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the corner of Church Street and 4th Avenue North in downtown Nashville, c.1960s. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
